title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap in a stunning teal color! This classic yoga mat is perfect for all your fitness and exercise routines, whether it's yoga, Pilates, or any floor exercise that requires extra cushion and support.

Our extra thick yoga mat, measuring 2/5 inch, provides the ultimate comfort and durability. It is the ideal all-purpose fitness mat, whether you're at the studio or working out at home. You can even use it around the house as a knee pad or standing cushion.

Made of NBR foam, this yoga mat is designed to provide soft cushioning for comfortable stretching and posing. It is perfect for beginners who prioritize comfort during their yoga practice.

To make your life easier, we have included a yoga mat carrier strap with your purchase. Simply strap up your mat and take it on the go, making it convenient for travel or carrying it to your next yoga class.

With dimensions of 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, this yoga mat is spacious enough to accommodate all body types. It weighs just 3.11 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to carry around.
